entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %

Dewpoint: -13.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
